item.title: Zookeeper笔记
item.description: 0.目录 [TOC] 1. 安装 1.1 创建zookeeper用户 [root@localhost ~]# adduser zookeeper [root@localhost ~]# passwd zookeeper Changing password for user zookeeper. New password: BAD PASSWORD: The password is shorter than 8 characters Retype new password: 切换到zookeeper用户登陆 1.2 解压jdk，zookeeper [zookeeper@localhost ~]$ tar -zxvf apache-zookeeper-3.6.2-bin.tar.gz [zookeeper@localhost ~]$ tar -zxvf jdk-11.0.10_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz 1.3 配置环境 1.3.1 配置java环境 [zookeeper@localhost ~]$ nano .bash_profile 添加以下内容 JAVA_HOME=/home/zookeeper/jdk-11.0.10 export JAVA_HOME PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export PATH 执行以下语句使配置生效 [zookeeper@localhost ~]$ . .bash_profile 1.3.2 配置zookeeper [zookeeper@localhost ~]$ cd apache-zookeeper-3.
